body.name: JACKYLED 16″ Under Cabinet Lights for Kitchen 2 Pack, Rechargeable Stick-on Desk Lighting, Updated Wave Sensor 65 LED 3000mAh Battery Under Counter Lights in Kitchen, Closet, Bedroom
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: HAND WAVE ACTIVATED: Instead of motion sensor that turns off without sensing human presence, we provide an easy way to get constant light for the kitchen or bedroom with just a wave, and it only turn off whenever you wave again. These JACKYLED kitchen lights under cabinet are a must-have for people that need consistent work under the lights without pressing any buttons.

TOUCHLESS DIMMING: With our dimmable under-cabinet LED lights, you can adjust brightness simply by holding your hand underneath the sensor, until you get the exact level of light for different task lighting needs, such as light over the sink or laundry, study or work light over the desk, etc.

LARGER BATTERY: Upgraded to a 3000mAh rechargeable battery pack that supports 8-9 hours of constant light at maximum brightness. This battery operated under cabinet light works for 3 months of normal use on the bookshelf, closet or cupboard per charge. The battery recharges in just 5-6 hours via the included USB-C cable.

BRIGHTER & WIDER ILLUMINATION: The 16-inch light bar brightens up all 12ft room space with 65 super bright LEDs. Emitting soft and glare-free 6000k cool white light, whether you need an RV awning light, shelf lights for workshop, or under-the-cabinet lights for kitchen, this touchless LED cabinet light is a perfect choice.

EASY TO INSTALL: Featured with built-in magnets that attach to any ironwork. Or use the iron plates with stickers and follow the instruction manual –all included–to stick on any flat surface. Experience luminous light under cabinet in just minutes after unboxing. NOTE: The wave sensor only functions within a clearance of at least 8 inches.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light, at your fingertips Are you searching for a kitchen lighting solution that allows for touch-free experience without a remote or wire? Are you yearning for a budget friendly and energy saving next generation task lighting solution? Are there areas in your home or office where you need light, but don’t want screws to destroy your furniture? Check out JACKYLED Touchless Hand Wave Under Cabinet Lights with 3000mAh Rechargeable Battery!

Next-Generation Kitchen Lighting Solution JACKYLED under cabinet lights are handy helpers for moms to finish so much housework or dads to work in their workshop that need sufficient lighting. Wave on, wave off, and dim by holding beneath the sensor. No need to wipe your hands and turn on any knob or button or look for the remote everywhere. Versatile LED Light for Daily Use Our under counter LED light bar uses side-lighting technology that emits soft and glare-free light. You can use these stick-on lights for a vanity, mirror, closet or anywhere that needs luminous light. Perfect for makeup and dressing lighting to reveal your true beauty.

Feature Highlight Touchless Dimming & ON/OFF: Turned on/off or dimmed without touch in a max 3” rangeExtra-long Duration: Powered 9 hours of constant bright light or 3 months of intermittent useBrighter Illumination: With 65 super bright LEDs, the under-cabinet task light provides 150 lumens at a 12ft/120°range Ultra Thin & Long: Only 0.35” thick—not obtrusive to any decor style, and 15.7” long—fits for lighting large cabinet spaceSoft & Glare-free Light: Diffused cool white light suitable for work or studyQuality Proof: With FCC, CE, UKCA certifications ensure safe use with no worries

What's the difference between PIR motion sensor and hand wave sensor? The motion sensor is usually designed for long range insensitive motion detection, with short duration of lighting; the hand-wave sensor is designed for close range sensitive touchless switch, and it can have constant on task lighting. How do I install the hand wave cabinet light? The wave sensor only functions within a clearance of at least 8 inches. Please make sure to leave the space under the sensor empty to use the touchless on/off and dimming function. Can I use other USB-C cable to charge the lights? Yes, you can use any USB-C cable to charge the lights, and you can plug in to the adapter or any Type-C outlet to charge the lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, nice and bright, very slim
reviews.reviewText: Great buy for under counter, closets hallway, etc. Will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy this product.
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy these lights. They do not work as advertised. The motion sensors on both do not work when installed under the cabinet with the light facing down. The battery does not last long so forget using them as night lights. Every time they have to be charged, the light must be removed from their magnets, charged, and then put back onto the magnets which are not strong enough. Very frustrating product. I am not returning them simply to avoid the lights being repackaged and sold again to the next unsuspecting customer. So whoever that might be, you are welcome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright light- just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for under a cabinet over a sink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One stopped working after 3 months
reviews.reviewText: I initially loved these lights, they were bright and worked on motion. However after about 45 days one started dying very quickly, within a day of charging. Now, another 45 days later, it doesn’t work at all.Now I have to move the one good one between the two brackets depending on where/what I’m doing in the kitchen. One is above my sink and the other above the countertop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The light works well but the charge cord needs to be a little longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these lights for under my cabinets. Items are as described. Works & looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Motion feature does not work for under cabinets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Replaced hardwired under cabinet lighting with this product. Installed easily and suited for my needs. Would recommend
